item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Ted, good stuff, see also <a href="/index.php/DataMgmt/DataDesign/how-to-make-sure-that-the-view-will-have">how to make sure that the view will have the underlying table changes by using sp_refreshview</a>
item.content:encoded: Ted, good stuff, see also how to make sure that the view will have the underlying table changes by using sp_refreshview
